attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Support a reconsideration of the Asylum and Immigration Tribunal's determination that Philip Lawrence's killer should not be deported. No account has been taken of Mr Lawrence's human rights when he was permanently deprived of them, nor of those of his widow and family.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
